scenario_text.value:
*huff* *huff*... We...won. All right! We...
did it!

Thanks, Varodurumon! We’re still alive and
kicking, thanks to that evolution!

You’re wrong there, Minoru. This is all the
result of your strength of will.

Strength of will, he says. I was just putting
on a show, you know that, right?

And I am here to tell you that you should be
proud of the attempt.

The “hero” you speak of is a valiant figure,
surely without flaws.

Regular people cannot achieve such standards.
Even so, they can still strive for them.

Dreaming, yearning, wishing. Summoning
courage when the time is right...

Seeing that in you, I am proud to be by your
side.

Stand tall and proud, Minoru. You are a fine
man.

And I am certain you can fly even higher.
Together with me, of course.

Oh yeah? Heheh, I’m getting all flushed here.
But I feel you, man.

Admiring heroes like I always have... Maybe
it ain’t so bad, huh?

Indeed! Minoru, let us never cease to seek
new heights!
